 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָדַף‎</span>] **verb** ==drive, drive asunder== ( Late Hebrew ***id., spread, be diffused, disseminated*** (of odour); Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***strike, beat***, especially bow-string with mallet, to clean cotton; also ***play*** the lyre; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎נְדַף‎</span> = Late Hebrew; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***throw, hurl***); — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִדְּפֶנּוּ‎</span> [[Job.32.13|Job 32:13]] (jussive); 3 feminine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּדְּפֶנּוּ‎</span> [[Ps.1.4|Ps 1:4]] 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּנְדֹּף‎</span> [[Ps.68.3|Ps 68:3]] — ***drive about, chaff***, subject wind [[Ps.1.4|Ps 1:4]] wicked, subject God [[Ps.68.3|Ps 68:3]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּהִנְדֹּף עָשָׁן‎</span>, see below); compare [[Job.32.13|Job 32:13]] (= defeat, anguish).

**Niph\`al** ***Perfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִדַּף‎</span> [[Isa.19.7|Isa 19:7]] ***Infinitive***. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּהִנְדֹּף‎</span> [[Ps.68.3|Ps 68:3]] (see [[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>i. 306 f</sup>); ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִדָּף‎</span> [[Lev.26.36|Lev 26:36]] + 3 t.; — ***be driven, driven about*** (especially by wind) [[Ps.68.3|Ps 68:3]], see above (like a driving [[[BDB#Che|Che]] ***drift***] of smoke); of breath (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֶבֶל‎</span>) figurative of deceitful gain [[Prov.21.6|Prov 21:6]] ([[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#Hi|Hi]] [[BDB#Ew|Ew]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹדֵף‎</span>; see [[BDB#De|De]] [[BDB#Now|Now]]); of withered plant [[Isa.19.7|Isa 19:7]] (where subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָרוֺת‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִוְרָע‎</span> i.e. place; whence [[BDB#Che|Che]] transitive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נ‎</span> ***vanish***; but reference probably to plant-life in these places, see [[BDB#Di|Di]]); of leaf [[Lev.26.36|Lev 26:36]] (as making slight sound), [[Job.13.25|Job 13:25]] (figurative of sufferer, \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קַשׁ יָבֵשׁ‎</span>), of chaff (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קַשׁ‎</span>) [[Isa.41.2|Isa 41:2]] (simile of bow of hostile kings \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָפָר‎</span>).
